mdRecord.dcterms:title: Eliza: or The unhappy nun: exemplifying the unlimited tyranny exercised by the abbots and abbesses over the ill-fated victims of their malice in the gloomy recesses of a convent. Including The adventures of Clementina, or The constant lovers, a true and affecting tale / Embellished with a frontispiece
The adventures of Clementina
The unhappy nun
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Barrington, George, 1755-1804 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: These stories appear in Biographical annals of suicide by George Barrington. cf. The marvellous magazine and compendium of prodigies, v. 4. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Disbound. Sadleir-Black Collection of Gothic Novels. Gift. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Chapbooks
